info.header: RSSAEGW077 - PMIP PBU received cause code on S5/S2
info.csv_title: PMIP PBU received cause code on S5/S2
info.help_text:
This report gives information about PMIP Proxy Binding Acknowledgement (PBA) responses sent per cause code on S5/S2 PMIP interface and is only relevant for the Flexi-NGs with P-GW functionality.
Use case specific instructions:
- This report can be used to troubleshoot the 'Proxy Binding Update' messages received on S5/S2 interfaces in Flexi-NGs with P-GW functionality;
- Note, 'Ratio' column is applicable on PRSS5 level only.
info.report-description: PMIP PBU received cause code on S5/S2
info.report-title: PMIP PBU received cause code on S5/S2
